name: Avoid Sections with a very low comment/code ratio (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Sections with a very low comment/code ratio.
output:
This report lists all Sections with a very low comment/code ratio.

This QR provides the following information:
- Section full name
- Comment/code ratio
rationale: A very low comment/code ratio makes the source code difficult to read, maintain and test. It is highly recommended to keep this ratio as high as possible.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Sections with a very low comment/code ratio.
